summary: Four types of low fantasy Viking style armour. Plus Viking Warrior Comp that adds weapons of various levels.
descriptionHtml:
Viking Warrior Compilation.ESP released with new Viking weapons! 

This must be used with The Chronicles of Steel Skyrim mod.

The aim of this mod is to allow the player to create more authentic/better looking (low fantasy) Viking characters and are not interested in taking advantage of all the heavy armour perks (you should be able to reach the cap through smithing anyway).

This mod is not complete and please let me know if there are any suggestions (including other mods that would improve the compilation), issues or amendements.

Iron smithing - Raider Helm (iron)
Steel Smithing - Vikingr Brynja (body only), Vikingr Helm (Steel)
Advanced armours - Hauscarls Hauberk (misc), Hauscarls Helm (steel) and light Scale armour (misc)
Glass Smithing required but in Msic catagory - Thanes Armour (Steel) and Thanes Helm (Steel)
Dragon smithing - Jarls Armour (Dragon)

Planned for later versions:
Apply mail texture to female Jarls Armour.

I recommend using Cloaks of Skyrim mod and The Chronicles of Steel Skyrim weapons mod with this compilation as they go really well with the armour.

Standalone Vendel Helmet from Hammerwing studios can be found here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15521


PLEASE NOTE:

Viking Warrior Compilation.ESP requires all the files from the Viking Armour Comp and for The Chronicles of Steel Skyrim weapons mod to be downloaded and installed separately. It can be found here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12506

It includes changes to vanilla items and does replace their Meshes and textures so may conflict with mods that do the same:

Iron Axe – Meshes and Texture changed to old Bearded Axe form TCOSS.
Steel Axe - Meshes and Texture changed to Worn Bearded Axe form TCOSS.
Steel BattleAxe - Meshes and Texture changed to Worn 2 HD Bearded Axe form TCOSS.
Steel sword - Meshes and Texture changed to GRAR for TCOSS.
Ancient Nord Sword - Meshes and Texture changed to WARP for TCOSS.

Armour Meshes and Textures replaced:

Iron Armour - Meshes and Texture changed to the same as Vikingr mail.
Steel Armour - Meshes and Texture changed to the same as Thanes mail.

Weapons Added:
Hauscarls Sword – uses the Meshes and Texture of NORLAND sword for TCOSS.
Hauscarls Axe – uses Meshes and Texture of Bearded Axe form TCOSS.
Hauscarls BattleAxe – uses Meshes and Texture of 2 HD Bearded Axe form TCOSS.
Hauscarls Bow – uses Meshes and Texture of Nord bow form TCOSS.


Thanes Sword – uses the Meshes and Texture of GOTLAND sword for TCOSS.
Thanes Axe – uses Meshes and Texture of Bearded Axe fine form TCOSS.
Thanes Greatsword – uses Meshes and Texture of 2 HD GOTLAND Sword form TCOSS.
Thanes Bow – uses Meshes and Texture of Nord bow fine form TCOSS.

Jarls Sword - uses the Meshes and Texture of NEAGLING sword for TCOSS.
A two handed weapon for Jarls category still to be added in due course.

These can all be crafted at the forge and require the same smithing perk tree as the appropriate level armour.

You must install TCOSS mod for these weapons to work but if you want to use only these and not the other TCOSS weapons as they are not scaled with the other items in the mod then uncheck the TCOSS.esp plugin. 

I am currently playing with TRO basic needs (a mod I heartily recommend) so I have also adjusted some of the food recipes by removing the need for Salt pile to cook the Rabbit haunch, Chicken breast, Pheasant breast and Salmon as these are light snacks and really don\'t need salt to be made edible in real life (only better tasting).

If you are experiencing CTD\'s with this mod I recommend you download BOSS at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6 and amend you load order as advised.

====================================
Viking Armour Compilation and Viking Warrior Compilation
====================================
Author: Laz3456

Version: 0.6
June 22, 2012

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

A compilation of various Viking armour type mods. Heavy Stormcloak armour with mail texture, Scale Armour (under misc section once you have advanced armours perk) and Thanes Armour (Ulfric’s clothes) almost equal to Dragonbone Plate armour (less armour but also lighter) which is craftable with Dragon smithing.

Viking Warrior Compliation.ESP requires The Cronicles of Steel real swords mod and includes appropriate weapons for the various levels of armour.

===============
2. INSTALLATION
===============

Extract the esp module and the meshes folder into your Skyrim\\Data folder and make sure either Viking armour comp.ESP or Viking Warrior comp.ESP (not both) is loaded after Open faced helmets.ESP.

==================
3. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v0.1: 

Initial Release. Compilation includes Scaled armour mod, Raider Helmet mod, Chain mail guards mod, Open faced Helmets mod, Stromcloak armour Heavy mod and a re-size of the hornless steel helmet.

v0.2:
Added Thanes Armour instead of the Dragonbone Plate replacement.

v0.3:
Thanes armour has craftable Helm, Cuirass, Gauntlets, Boots and Shield

v0.4:
Renamed Thanes armour to Jarls armour has craftable Helm, Cuirass, Gauntlets, Boots and Shield.
Thanes Armour has Helm, Cuirass and Shield
Hauscarls Hauberk Cuirass only.
Vikingr Brynja Cuirass only.
Reduced AV for Stormcloak armour to just below imperial.
Adjusted stats and smithing requirements so armour scales to player development.

v0.5:
Swapped Thanes (now mail hauberk) and Haucarls Armour (now scale hauberk).
Added the following helmets.
Vikingr Helm. Croc\'s Nasal Helm
Haucarls Helm. Croc\'s spectacle Helm
Thanes Helm. HammerwingStudio\'s Viking helm with knot work.
Jarls Helm. HammerwingStudio\'s Viking helm with knot work Vendel version.

Viking Warrior Compilation
v0.6:
Added compatibility with TCOSS weapons, added my own wepons, amended some food recipes and amended some Vanilla textures of low level items for a more Viking feel.
Itmes added:
Hauscarls Sword 
Hauscarls Axe 
Hauscarls BattleAxe 
Hauscarls Bow 

Thanes Sword 
Thanes Axe 
Thanes Greatsword
Thanes Bow 

Jarls Sword

Vanilla Meshes and textures replaced.
Iron axe.
Steel axe.
Steel battleaxe.
Steel sword.

Iron armour.
Steel armour.
==================
3. CREDITS
==================

shingouki2002 and Waalx – The Chronicles of Steel Skyrim mod for all new wepons.
HammerwingStudios - Viking helm with Knot work and Vendel version of the same.
Croc - Scaled armour mod (Names and some stats modified)
Croc - Viking/Norse Maille mod (Names and some stats modified)
redxavier - Raider Helmet mod
chupacabrax - Chainmail guards mod 
Madcat221 - Openfaced helmets mod 
Laz 3456 - Stromcloak armour heavy, steel helmet re-size, Thanes Armour, AV stat scaling, Viking Warrior Compilation weapons stats and compilation complier.
author: Laz3456
